item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Career and Education 2022 - Present Research Fellow at School of Mathematics, University of Birmingham, UK; working on an EPSRC-funded project about analysis of evolutionary PDEs as gradient flows arising from Optimal Transportation Theory with Dr Hong Duong; organising the Reading Group on Mathematics of Data Science (see Events). 2019 - 2022 Research Associate at School of Mathematics, Cardiff University, UK; working on an EPSRC-funded project about stochastic elasticity with Dr Angela Mihai; organising the Applied and Computational Mathematics Seminar in 2020/2021 and 2021/2022 (see YouTube channel).
